channel.title: Purbanchal Directory - Recently Added Listings - Education

item.title: Kids Village
item.description: Kids Village, the first time in Biratnagar, is scientifically designed pre school with a real Montessori concept established in 2070 B.S. There has been a gap between the prospective children and good quality pre school education in Biratnagar. A team of academicians therefore, wants to use its expertise to fill up the deficit of motherly treatment behaviour in theory and practice by providing good education at pre school level.
item.dc:creator: superadmin

item.title: KinderPillar
item.description: Kinder Pillar Ivy league is the first American-Format preschool in Itahari. We provide world class ambiance with modern facilities. Safe and secure environment with CCTV camera in each classrooms with hygienic fooding facility ,Attractive play areas with the teacher child ratio 1:10, kinder smart class, Splash pool, Toy library, Karate classes, French language classes, Own school bus, Day care Facility.
item.dc:creator: jeena

item.title: TrainACE
item.description: TrainACE is an established and award-winning training organization that provides excellent customer experiences, unbeatable prices and high-quality training. We have a long-standing history of customer satisfaction as evidenced by our online reviews, and we pride ourselves on being able to provide top-quality education at an amazing value.

item.description: Neosphere is an Industry standard computer training institute in Nepal offering a wide range of courses in IT imparted with modern learning methodologies.

item.title: ICRI Corporate Services
item.description: ICRI (Institute of Clinical Research India) is country’s renowned institution for clinical research and healthcare which focuses on providing specialized Clinical Research Programmes. We specialize in courses like Post Graduate Diploma Advance Clinical Research, BSc/MSc Clinical research programmes, PhD in Clinical Research and many more Clinical Research in Pune courses that students can take admission in and start their career towards a promising future.

item.title: SMART TUITION CENTER
item.description: We provide special tuition classes on central location of biratnagar. We provide tuition classes from class One to class Ten. We special focused to SEE appearing students. You are always free to contact us for the better and quality education in your locality. Our Teacher are highly qualified and experienced. Tuition Fees:1500 Home Tuition: Negotiable

item.title: Oddyssey Secondary English Boarding School
item.description: Located in Biratnagar providing students with standard education and proper guidance shaping them for the competitive future ahead. We not only focus on just studies but also on the personality growth making the student well educated and well mannered as well. Admission Open for the calendar year 2074 B.S. and we are providing special discount offer for classes 6 and 9. Please call us or visit our school for further information. Oddyssey Secondary English Boarding School Biratnagar-10 Principal

item.title: Arniko Higher Secondary School Hotel Management
item.description: You've come to the right place. We are one of the leading innovative education providers in Biratnagar. Founded 37 years ago, our diverse institutions are leaders in their specialist fields, having successfully trained thousands of individuals from Biratnagar and the eastern Nepal. We are well known for high quality academic programmes, exceptionally high training standards and friendly learning environments.

item.title: Namuna Vidya - Mandir
item.description: Namuna Vidya-Mandir (NVM) was established in 2050 B.S. along with a rented building. It has come a long way in the field of both educational and economical standard because it has been able to set up its own new building at Madhumara (Peepal Chowk) and classes from Nursery to Standard Ten are regularly going on. Besides, classes from Nursery to five are also running in Devkota Chowk. Believing that "Knowledge is Power" NVM has also been able to touch the hearts of all by providing imparting quality education and by having 100% SLC result, 2054.

item.title: Shikshadeep Higher Secondary School
item.description:
Shikshadeep H.S.S. is an educational organization of professionals working together in the field of education for a long time with distinct aim to provide quality education focusing on the career formation of students to make them able and dignified citizens of the 21st century. It is managed by a highly experienced, dedicated and renowned team of SCIENCE and MANAGEMENT faculties committed to ensure bright future to students enrolled in it. As +2 Science and +2 Management are two separate programs, there are two separate blocks for each equipped with all the facilities required for science and management students. Shikshadeep H.S.S. is situated at the heart of Biratnagar Sub-Metropolitan city, ward no. 14, near Neel Sadan, easily accessible from all the parts of the city.
Tel: 021-535292 (Management) 021-440397 (Science)

item.title: Orchid College
item.description: Orchid, established in 2065 B . s is a leading academic institute of eastern region of Nepal. It possesses experienced, qualified and prestigious academic professional with enormous exposure and recognition in the field of education. It maintains a high class existence with marvelous infrastructure. The team of orchid is bent on providing quality education keeping its student in contact with the current affairs going around the world. The chief end of orchid is to make its students competent in their respective field so they can cope with any problems easily. Orchid college is genuinely ideal academic platform characterized by stimulating and supporting atmosphere. The college is located at the center of the town which is easily accessible for the students living to and fro from it.
item.dc:creator: superadmin

item.title: Delhi Public School
item.description: Founded as a Delhi Public School Biratnagar on May 7th, 2008 under the aegis of the Delhi Public School Society, is one of the most prestigious school in Biratnagar, Nepal. It is beneath the effervescence of its campus, that the students of Delhi Public School Biratnagar find the wellsprings of the professional attitude and vigour, which distinguish it from other schools. Students develop their own abilities and talents, and discover their teaming potential to the fullest, which is reached in an invigorating and competitive atmosphere, created by excellent facilities, and, exposure and guidance provided by a highly qualified and dedicated faculty. DPS Montessori Montessori is not a system for training children in academic studies; nor is it a label to be put on educational materials. It is a revolutionary method of observing and supporting the natural development of children. Montessori educational practice helps children develop creativity, problem solving, critical thinking and time-management skills, to contribute to society and the environment.
item.dc:creator: superadmin

item.title: Applied College
item.description: Applied College is established with a distinct view to provide quality education to the students thereby making them globally competent. Applied College is run by young, energetic academicians and professionals of the eastern-region. It is exclusively devoted and dedicated to achieve its goal to produce highly efficient human resources for the contemporary global market. Applied College places equal emphasis on ethical, social and practical values for global knowledge. The term APPLIED derives its name from the 7 basic human values; Attitude, Practice, Planning, Learning, Intelligence, Equality, Distinct. Applied team comprises highly experienced, qualified and leading academic professionals and astute managers with enormous exposure and recognition in the field of management studies. Applied College is promoted by Professional Careers and Education Pvt. Ltd., the college is affiliated to Tribhuwan University for management programme like BBS, CA and AT(Affiliated to ICAN) as well as professional job oriented training. The college is situated at a prime location of Biratnagar.
item.dc:creator: superadmin

item.title: Purbanchal University School of Engineering and Technology (PUSET)
item.description: Purbanchal University School Of Engineering And Technology ( P.U. S.E.T. / पियूसेट ) established in 2056 B.S. is a Constituent Campus of the University.It was the pioneer campus to start B.C.A. program in 2056 B.S. and is the first college to introduce B.I.T. program in Nepal. It further launched the Computer Engineering and the Electronics and Communication programs.It offers both undergraduate (BE Computer, BE E&C, BCA and BIT) and graduate (MCA, Postgraduate Diploma in Computer Application) programs.B.S.)
item.dc:creator: superadmin

item.title: Damak Technical Education Foundation
item.description: Damak Technical Education Foundation (DTEF), Damak-10 was established in 2065 B.S. to offer various educational programmes as a part of its effort to bring education to masses and fulfill the growing demand for technical and management professionals. Affiliated to the Tribhuwan University (TU), Sikkim Manipal University (SMU)and Council for Technical Education and Vocation Training (CTEVT), It was founded as a private campus in Damak to fulfill the increasing demand of higher education in the area of technological sector. DTEF is further dedicated and determined to cultivate a purely educational environment that stimulates and encourages a quest and thirst of learning by the best utilization of its various resources/ techniques. The college (DTEF) gives emphasis on innovative and creative teaching-learning activities along with the occasional co-curricular activities. Campus inspires creative learners to find golden path for their glowing future. Thanks !
item.dc:creator: superadmin

item.title: Eastern College of Engineering
item.description: At Eastern College of Engineering we envision our institute as the fountain head of excellence in engineering knowledge to result in engineers instilled with a sense of commitment, responsibility & belongingness both in their professorial & personnel lives. Why Choose EASCOLL ? Computer Laboratory Modern Scientific Laboratory Education & Sports Library Digital Library Club of Robotics Experienced Faculties Located in the City Academic Programs 1. Bachelor of Engineering in Computers The main objective of the department is to provide excellence in recent trends in computer science & engineering. This course will prepare the students to learn, and construct the programs in various language viz. C, C++, Java. Besides various electives like Fault Tolerant Computing, GIS, Embedded system on list the students are put through live project works through modern computing network. The necessary technological advancement in modern computing world will also be incorporated from time to time to prepare the students with the challenges of new millennium. 2. Bachelor of Engineering in Civils In a developing country like Nepal Civil Engineering can bring about a revolution in uplifting the living standard of the people by providing basic and modern amenities & infrastructure for development. This course provides the students to learn, design and maintain the urban & rural, construction with specialization in CAD. The faculties take keen interest in industry interaction & research work in order to provide the most modern knowledge in the related field. The students enjoy working on real life projects. 3. Bachelor of Engineering in Electronics & Communication The course intends to introduce the students to the world of Electronics & Communication Engineering. This course will also provide the students the requirements of the modern digital communication network which will be required to design, develop and maintain various electronic systems to learn the principles of modern digital devices and their applications. The faculty members are regularly invited by reputed industries and organizations for corporate training, seminar etc.
item.dc:creator: superadmin

item.title: Birat Kshitiz College PVT.LTD
item.description: Birat Kshitiz College was established in 2069 under the company act 2063 B.S., Nepal. It got approval from Tribhuvan University to run Bachelor of Science in Computer Science & Information Technology (B.Sc.CSIT) program in 2070. The college is found by team members who are involved for a long time in IT sector. The college is centrally located and providing an easy access to the students from anywhere in the city or outside
item.dc:creator: superadmin

item.title: Adarsha Vidhyalaya
item.description: Nepal's oldest school outside valley. A technical college with full resources. We have +2 (science, education, management) stream with Technical education TSLC computer Engineering and Diploma In computer Engineering.
item.dc:creator: superadmin

item.title: Sushma Godawari College
item.description: Sushma Godawari College Featured +2 Science, Computer Science, Management & Hotel Management Godawari College is the first +2 college established in Itahari and has successfully completed its 17 different batches. The college has been running the +2 classes in science, and Management streams. The college has dedicated & energetic team of teachers along with well equipped lab & library. It is our pride to say that some of our competent & successful products have occupied a prestigious social status in the field of health and business. We feel proud to have our own products working with us in the similar posts which we occupy today. Our shrive of last seventeen years have added some pillars of nation as doctors, engineers, CA's and many more in different service. ********************************************** B.Sc. CSIT B.Sc. CSIT is the best computer science course among all other similar programmes in the country because it's degree is recognized by universities all over the world. This is a 4 years/8 semesters/126 credit hours course that offers intensive courses in computational theory, design, programming and application. It is the only course that allows the pupils to specialize in the subject of their choice during the final semester, with lots of emphasis on practical based learning and internship, the course gives them ample opportunites to pursue their future career anywhere in the world. *********************************************** BBS 4 years Godawari College, established in affiliation with Tribhuban University, has successfully completed four batches of its three years BBS level. The college has started 4 years BBS with Computer Science and Hotel Management. The college has got competed and experienced faculty members to ensure quality education to the students with financially strong management. The students studying in BBS level have been doing their internship in different local banks and financial institutions to develop the competence and even visiting different industries, as well to attain better knowledge about the commercial world. Besides we offer additional packages like Accounting, Computer Packages and Enterpreneurship skill training. In fact students enjoy BBA in BBS curriculum

item.title: Merryland College Biratnagar
item.description:
The objective of quality education is to make students competent in thinking and working. Education must encourage student to be sold enough to step ahead with the above mission along with promise and efforts.
Merryland aims at providing students with instruction at a par with the latest international standard in order to prevent the increasing trend of talented students to migrate elsewhere from Biratnagar for better education. We prepare our students not only to compete the students of Nepal but they will be able to compete the students of Delhi, Beijing, London, Washington and other famous education centers of the global academy.
item.dc:creator: superadmin

item.title: Koshi Health Institute / & Science Campus
item.description:
Welcome to Koshi Health Institute / & Science Campus Biratnagar,! We are located at the heart of Biratnagar city, opposite to sansarimaistahan. We are the Best Health education center in eastern region of nepal.
Our institution has been established for producing qualified manpower in the sector of health, we are providing certificate level education,since 2055 BS after being affiliated to CTEVT(The Council for Technical Education and Vocational Training) under CTEVT we run diploma in pharmacy (D.PHARMA),HA(Health Assistant),CMA, ANM and Lab Assistant. We are also affiliated to Purwanchal University and offering BPH, BN and B.Sc Nursing Programs. Vision- Building Health Futures by increasing the equity, effectiveness and efficiency health services to all populations. Mission - To develop next generation of leaders in the health sector by conducting the highest quality research, educating health professions in policy, management and public health practice, and partnering with the community to disseminate and apply new knowledge.
Goal/ Objectives-
-Contribute to meet the great demand of rural health care providers.
-Help to create jobs for rural health.
-Contribute to improve quality and accessibility of primary health care to the people.
-Commitment to realizing our mission by achieving and continually improving our research, education and service goals.
item.dc:creator: superadmin
